leve.name: Bold and Blue
leve.description: Knights are known for keeping both their armor and underclothes free from field stains and dragon blood; however, they cannot prevent the colors of their array from gradually fading from exposure to the elements. Discolored attire must be replaced as per the code of conduct, and our weavers request a seasoned botanist to make for the Sea of Clouds and gather bright blueclouds, which will be boiled into a dye of Ishgardian blue.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
